input_text:
Job Title: Demand Generation Channel Manager

Location: Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Demand Generation Channel ManagerAbout PaymentusPaymentus was born from a desire to improve the way bills get paid. Vision, innovation and exemplary service have propelled Paymentus to become the leading paperless electronic billing and payment solution on the market, and our proudly serving the needs of many of the largest billers in North America.
We know that in order to keep our solutions current and relevant, we need people with the know-how, drive and proclivity for fostering a supremely happy customer experience. Our highly committed, creative employees turned an idea into a secure, SAAS-based Customer Engagement and Payment Platform; one that enables direct-bill organizations to provide a unified customer experience and boost adoption of cost-saving electronic billing and payment services.
Recognized by Deloitte to be among the fastest growing North American companies for 4 years, Paymentus consistently strives to develop better, faster, more secure, cost-efficient billing and payment platforms. We continually seek higher value for our customers, in both solutions and service.
Summary/ObjectiveThis position provides support to the business development representatives (BDRs) by assisting in various tasks with the goal of generating qualified leads. Job Function:Point person for the business development team collaborating with Marketing, Sales and OperationsSupport the development and implementation of marketing campaigns to support pipeline generationAssist business development representatives in their prospecting efforts through list creation, salesforce campaign development and lead routingCreate, scrub and prepare target listsReview and manage lead routing tasks through various channelsProvide support in creating and customizing SalesLoft campaigns specific to the sales needs and goalsCreate, manage and present results and analysis on a consistent basis both on a broad level as well as vertical specific while using results to improve tactical performanceTroubleshoot and resolve technical, reporting and process issues/gapsManage, create and adhere to processes

Essential Functions/ResponsibilitiesProficient in Salesforce, Zoominfo, Demandbase, SalesloftUnderstanding of the lead routing processStrong organizational skills both written and verbal and attention to detail with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities simultaneouslyExcellent communication skills and thrive in a fast-paced environmentStrong problem-solving skills and the ability to think creatively to overcome obstacles and achieve goalsAbility to work independently as well as part of a collaborative team environmentA drive to be accountable for pipeline generation through the business development team as a result of activities and campaigns
Supervisory ResponsibilityThis position is a highly collaborative one, requiring individuals who can both take guidance, and lead without authority. This position does not have any supervisory responsibility.Work EnvironmentThis position operates in a professional business office environment or home office. This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as laptop computers, photocopiers and smartphones. Collaboration with other team members is as critical a skill as customer communications. 
Physical DemandsWhile performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or listen. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision and ability to adjust focus. Must be able to lift up to 15 pounds at times.Position Type/Expected Hours of WorkThis is a full-time position. Days and hours of work are Monday through Friday, during normal business hours. While rare, occasional evening and weekend work may be required as job duties demand.TravelTravel to meet with clients or potential clients or attend marketing events may be on occasion. Travel requirement is up to 5%; however, travel may be greater or less than this percentage during certain periods of the year.EEO StatementPaymentus is an equal opportunity employer. We enthusiastically accept our responsibility to make employment decisions without regard to actual or perceived race, creed, color, age, sex or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth and related medical conditions), gender identity or gender expression (including transgender status), sexual orientation, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, religion, marital status, physical or mental disability, military service or veteran status, genetic information, protected medical condition as defined by applicable state or local law, genetic information, or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state, and local laws and ordinances. Our management is dedicated to ensuring the fulfillment of this policy with respect to hiring, placement, promotion, transfer, demotion, layoff, termination, recruitment advertising, pay, and other forms of compensation, training, access to facilities and programs and general treatment during employment.Reasonable AccommodationPaymentus recognizes and supports its obligation to endeavor to accommodate job applicants and employees with known physical or mental disabilities who are able to perform the essential functions of the position, with or without reasonable accommodation. Paymentus will endeavor to provide reasonable accommodations to otherwise qualified job applicants and employees with known physical or mental disabilities, unless doing so would impose an undue hardship on the Company or pose a direct threat of substantial harm to the employee or others.An applicant or employee who believes he or she needs a reasonable accommodation of a disability should discuss the need for possible accommodation with the Human Resources Department, or his or her direct supervisor.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Demand Generation Channel Manager
output_json.summary: Supports business development representatives by assisting in various tasks to generate qualified leads.
job_responsibilities: Collaborates with Marketing, Sales, and Operations
Assists in developing and implementing marketing campaigns
Creates, scrubs, and prepares target lists
Reviews and manages lead routing tasks
Supports in creating and customizing SalesLoft campaigns
Monitors and presents results and analysis
Troubleshoots technical, reporting, and process issues
output_json.company_information: Paymentus is a leading paperless electronic billing and payment solution provider.

Paymentus endeavors to accommodate job applicants and employees with known physical or mental disabilities.
